sourcing.instructions: Co: Metal suppliers or online marketplaces; P: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers; Pa: Specialty chemical suppliers; Tm: Metal shops.
steps: Co: Metal suppliers or online marketplaces; P: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers; Pa: Specialty chemical suppliers; Tm: Metal shops.
1. Weigh out 180 g of cobalt (Co), 120 g of phosphorus (P), 20 g of palladium (Pa), and 40 g of thulium (Tm) using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 180 g of cobalt (Co), 120 g of phosphorus (P), 20 g of palladium (Pa), and 40 g of thulium (Tm) using a digital scale.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool slowly to room temperature (approximately 25째C) over a period of 4-6 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool slowly to room temperature (approximately 25째C) over a period of 4-6 hours.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified material from the crucible carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified material from the crucible carefully.
